name: Modular PSX Shooting Range Kit - Playable Demo
name_original: Modular PSX Shooting Range Kit - Playable Demo
description:
This pack contains 80 unique modular object meshes for use in modular building of game environments. The assets are scaled to (somewhat) true to life scale.

The core scale factor is 1.5 meters / 3 meters

Textures provided are 512x512 or 1024x1024 for larger texture atlases. The demo scene downscales these to 256x256 though!

A Unity Package is included in the download with all assets prefabbed and ready to use!!

This pack contains shooting range architecture pieces and a whole lot of props to be used in your games!

TEXTURES AND UNITY MATERIALS PROVIDED

FULL ASSET LIST:

  • 10 Modular architecture pieces including:
    •  Floors (2 variants)
    • Concrete walls (4 variants)
    • Plywood walls (with separate backing mesh) (3 variants)
      • Solid walls
      • Doorways
      • Windows + frames
    • Wire fence
    • Unity prefabbed versions of all of the above
  • Props:
    • Gun table + end cap to make it as long as you like
    • Sand bags (7 variants)
    • Barrels (3 variants)
    • Gun safety posters (5 variants)
    • Animatable targets (3 variants, Humanoid, Round and Squared)
    • Ladder + end cap to make it as long as you like
    • Lights (4 coloured variants - off (base), Red, Green and Amber)
    • Wooden pallet
    • Shipping container (4 colour variants)
    • Tyres
  • Ammo:
    • 6 Box variants for pistol, machine gun, rifle, sniper rifle, high caliber and shotgun
    • 2 pistol bullet variants
    • 2 shotgun shell variants
    • Rifle cartridge
    • All bullets come with "used" version with missing bullet tip
